channel.title: Ossie Stuart on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: What if my personal assistants need to self-isolate?
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm OS - Ossie Stuart Dr Ossie Stuart is an academic, researcher and an independent equalities consultant who has written key works on race, disability and social care. He is a wheelchair user and firmly believes that we are all entitled to fully participate in society and have control over our own destinies: these two ideas have heavily influenced everything he has done and will do in his working life.
